thread.title: VERBATIM: Young shooting survivor asks Trump for change

title: VERBATIM: Young shooting survivor asks Trump for change
text:
VERBATIM: Young shooting survivor asks Trump for change Wednesday, February 21, 2018 - 02:05 
Samuel Zeif of Parkland, Florida, who survived the shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas, suggested to President Trump that legislation in Australia that prevented shootings should be considered as the United States works to prevent future school shootings. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Samuel Zeif of Parkland, Florida, who survived the shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas, suggested to President Trump that legislation in Australia that prevented shootings should be considered as the United States works to prevent future school shootings.
